page.title: 07D.I.H.E.
page.content: The Dorset Institute of HIgher Education is in Wallisdown Road, Bournemouth. Approximately 400 people are employed there including 200 lecturers. Ther are 200 students attending full-time/sandwich courses and 1600 stdents attending part-time courses. lectures last at least one hour and laboratory lectures may last up to three hours. Plans are in hand for the Institute to become a Polytechnic. Unlike a university, it will offer both part-time and full-time courses at degree and H.N.C. level. Professional and sandwich courses will also be run. In the next 20 years the Institute will be developing resource based learning. This will enable students to study at home. As there is no university in South East Dorset the D.I.H.E. will fill this gap.
